$interpreted: Lizard Soldier: Phew... Damn, I'm beat... Let's just rest up a moment...
Lizard Soldier: Ahh... that's better~
Misa: Great work, everybody. The Sun Capitol's right up ahead, so let's make one last push for it.
Misa: Her Majesty and the Desert Kingdom await our good news.
Lizard Soldier: Yes, Holy Maiden!
Clergywoman: Misa! Monsters incoming!
Misa: Monsters? Here too!?
Lizard Soldier: D-dammit... I'm totally spent from trekking through the desert...
Misa: We mustn't—
Dylan: We mustn't let emissaries of the Desert Kingdom come to harm in the vicinity of the Sun Capitol!
Dylan: Onwards! Stop those monsters!
Dylan: Sorry we're late. I'm here to receive you by order of my Queen. Are you and your retinue unharmed?
Misa: You wouldn't happen to be... Dylan, Colonel to the Kingdom of the Sun's Royal Infantry?
Dylan: That's me. We've met once before, two years ago. I didn't think you'd remember me, Holy Maiden Misa.
Misa: Thanks for rescuing us.
Misa: ...But by the looks of things, the Kingdom of the Sun's been overrun by monsters, too.
Dylan: ...Yes, just recently the situation's rapidly gotten out of hand. I hope you're not spooked.
Misa: We're all fine, now you're here. This must be tiring for you.
Dylan: ...Queen Angelia awaits you in the palace. Allow me to escort you so that you may speak in person.
Misa: Oh? All right then. You have our gratitude.
Dylan: Back to the palace, everyone!
Angelia: ...Judging from both our forces' intelligence combined, a void has opened up in the East and is spewing forth monsters.
Angelia: They're running rampant all over Vendacti.
Misa: And not just monsters, but refugees from the East, too. They're paralyzing ports throughout the desert!
Angelia: Queen Diana mentioned that in her letter. She's rushing about left and right trying to resettle them...
Misa: She's doing all she can... But the influx is too great for the Desert Kingdom to bear. She's being forced to close the borders.
Misa: But we can't just stand by and watch...!
Misa: Her Majesty's too tied up to come herself, but she's sent me as her envoy to request the Kingdom of the Sun's assistance.
Misa: Your Kingdom helped us once by sheltering refugees, and now we need your help once more.
Angelia: ......
Dylan: Your Highness, we already...
Angelia: ...I know.
Misa: ...Is there a problem?
Angelia: Holy Maiden Misa, I understand the predicament your Kingdom and Diana are in. We'll do all we can to help you.
Misa: Then—
Angelia: But I'm afraid this is beyond my power now.
Misa: ...Huh?
Angelia: My Colonel received word earlier that the Slums have been swamped by monsters. He was held up and was nearly too late to rescue your delegation.
Dylan: ...My deepest apologies...
Angelia: No, all the garrisoned troops were already dispatched to assist with fending off the monsters. That left only the Royal Infantry to maintain law and order.
Angelia: This wasn't your fault. It's just the reality.
Dylan: Your Highness...
Angelia: As you've seen, Holy Maiden Misa, we're having a hard enough time defending ourselves, nevermind the Desert Kingdom...
Misa: But how could that be...
Angelia: To be frank, I'm in the same bind as Queen Diana. I've sent word to Totemtaff to request the assistance of the Bears.
Angelia: But so far I've heard nothing back...
Dylan: Given Your Highness' good standing with the Bears... I fear their slowness in replying means they've got troubles of their own.
Angelia: Maybe so. But I've nobody left to send for. All I can do is hope that they and Naya haven't come to harm.
Dylan: ...They're battle-hardened warriors. They'll be all right.
Angelia: I hope so...
Angelia: ......
Angelia: I really, truly wish there was something I could do for the Desert Kingdom and the refugees from the East.
Angelia: But as Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun, I have to make tough choices.
Angelia: ...I'm sorry.
Misa: Please, you've nothing to apologize for...
Angelia: ......
Misa: Wait, you don't mean that you're going back on your word, do you? You won't help us!?
Angelia: ...I'm truly, very sorry.
Misa: Sorry isn't gonna fix anything! What are the refugees and the Desert Kingdom to do!?
Angelia: That's not my responsibility. It isn't my place to tell you what you should do.
Misa: You're heartless! This isn't becoming of a great Queen!
Dylan: Holy Maiden Misa, please calm down. If you can't control yourself, I'll...
Angelia: It's all right, Colonel Dylan.
Angelia: I cannot decide for you, but I can offer you my counsel.
Angelia: —If I were the ruler of the Desert Kingdom, and my people couldn't hold out any longer, I would close the borders.
Angelia: That is my response to Queen Diana.
Angelia: ...Please deliver it to her.
Misa: How can you be so cruel!! And so callous...

Model.Text: Phew... Damn, I'm beat... Let's just rest up a moment...
Ahh... that's better~
Great work, everybody. The Sun Capitol's right up ahead, so let's make one last push for it.
Her Majesty and the Desert Kingdom await our good news.
Yes, Holy Maiden!
Misa! Monsters incoming!
Monsters? Here too!?
D-dammit... I'm totally spent from trekking through the desert...
We mustn't—
We mustn't let emissaries of the Desert Kingdom come to harm in the vicinity of the Sun Capitol!
Onwards! Stop those monsters!
Sorry we're late. I'm here to receive you by order of my Queen. Are you and your retinue unharmed?
You wouldn't happen to be... Dylan, Colonel to the Kingdom of the Sun's Royal Infantry?
That's me. We've met once before, two years ago. I didn't think you'd remember me, Holy Maiden Misa.
Thanks for rescuing us.
...But by the looks of things, the Kingdom of the Sun's been overrun by monsters, too.
...Yes, just recently the situation's rapidly gotten out of hand. I hope you're not spooked.
We're all fine, now you're here. This must be tiring for you.
...Queen Angelia awaits you in the palace. Allow me to escort you so that you may speak in person.
Oh? All right then. You have our gratitude.
Back to the palace, everyone!
...Judging from both our forces' intelligence combined, a void has opened up in the East and is spewing forth monsters.
They're running rampant all over Vendacti.
And not just monsters, but refugees from the East, too. They're paralyzing ports throughout the desert!
Queen Diana mentioned that in her letter. She's rushing about left and right trying to resettle them...
She's doing all she can... But the influx is too great for the Desert Kingdom to bear. She's being forced to close the borders.
But we can't just stand by and watch...!
Her Majesty's too tied up to come herself, but she's sent me as her envoy to request the Kingdom of the Sun's assistance.
Your Kingdom helped us once by sheltering refugees, and now we need your help once more.
Your Highness, we already...
...I know.
...Is there a problem?
Holy Maiden Misa, I understand the predicament your Kingdom and Diana are in. We'll do all we can to help you.
Then—
But I'm afraid this is beyond my power now.
...Huh?
My Colonel received word earlier that the Slums have been swamped by monsters. He was held up and was nearly too late to rescue your delegation.
...My deepest apologies...
No, all the garrisoned troops were already dispatched to assist with fending off the monsters. That left only the Royal Infantry to maintain law and order.
This wasn't your fault. It's just the reality.
Your Highness...
As you've seen, Holy Maiden Misa, we're having a hard enough time defending ourselves, nevermind the Desert Kingdom...
But how could that be...
To be frank, I'm in the same bind as Queen Diana. I've sent word to Totemtaff to request the assistance of the Bears.
But so far I've heard nothing back...
Given Your Highness' good standing with the Bears... I fear their slowness in replying means they've got troubles of their own.
Maybe so. But I've nobody left to send for. All I can do is hope that they and Naya haven't come to harm.
...They're battle-hardened warriors. They'll be all right.
I hope so...
I really, truly wish there was something I could do for the Desert Kingdom and the refugees from the East.
But as Queen of the Kingdom of the Sun, I have to make tough choices.
...I'm sorry.
Please, you've nothing to apologize for...
Wait, you don't mean that you're going back on your word, do you? You won't help us!?
...I'm truly, very sorry.
Sorry isn't gonna fix anything! What are the refugees and the Desert Kingdom to do!?
That's not my responsibility. It isn't my place to tell you what you should do.
You're heartless! This isn't becoming of a great Queen!
Holy Maiden Misa, please calm down. If you can't control yourself, I'll...
It's all right, Colonel Dylan.
I cannot decide for you, but I can offer you my counsel.
—If I were the ruler of the Desert Kingdom, and my people couldn't hold out any longer, I would close the borders.
That is my response to Queen Diana.
...Please deliver it to her.
How can you be so cruel!! And so callous...

This isn't becoming of a great Queen!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Holy Maiden Misa, please calm down. If you can't control yourself, I'll...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's all right, Colonel Dylan.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I cannot decide for you, but I can offer you my counsel.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014If I were the ruler of the Desert Kingdom, and my people couldn't hold out any longer, I would close the borders.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That is my response to Queen Diana.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Please deliver it to her.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How can you be so cruel!! And so callous...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_401_001_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
